Direct Known Subclasses:
IngredientsDbManager, RecipesDbManager, ResultsDbManager
public class DbManager
extends FModel<FView>

Singleton class that manages the application's database.

Mark Tupala

insertRecipeIngredients

public boolean insertRecipeIngredients(Ingredient ingred,
                                       long recipeURI)
Inserts the given Ingredient into the database such that it is associated with the recipe identified by recipeURI.

Parameters:
ingred - The ingredient to be inserted.
recipeURI - The URI of the Recipe with which to associate the Ingredient.
Returns:
True on success, False on failure.

insertRecipePhotos

public boolean insertRecipePhotos(Photo photo,
                                  Bitmap bitmap,
                                  long recipeURI)
Inserts the given Photo into the database such that it is associated with the recipe identified by recipeURI.

Parameters:
photo - The photo to be inserted.
bitmap - The bitmap of the photo to be inserted.
recipeURI - The URI of the Recipe with which to associate the Photo.
Returns:
True on success, False on failure.

updateRecipe

public boolean updateRecipe(Recipe recipe)
Update the entry in the Db with the URI given by the Recipe parameter with the values given by the Recipe parameter.

Parameters:
recipe - The updated recipe to be stored in the database.
Returns:
True on success, False on failure.

removeRecipe

public boolean removeRecipe(Recipe recipe)
Remove the given recipe from both local storage and the database.

Parameters:
recipe - The recipe to be deleted.
Returns:
True on success, False on failure.

removeRecipePhoto

public boolean removeRecipePhoto(Photo photo)
Removes the given photo from the local storage device.

Parameters:
photo - The photo to be deleted.
Returns:
true on success, false on failure

removeRecipeIngredients

public boolean removeRecipeIngredients(long uri)
Deletes the ingredients associated with the recipe specified by the uri (ie. removes them from the RecipeIngredients table).

Parameters:
uri - The uri of the recipe whose ingredients we would like to remove.
Returns:
true on success, false on failure
